DOC.brief_summary: Pycrinil® purify extract artichoke leaf . Artichoke leaf extract ( ALE ) clinical trial data suggest benefit treatment cholesterol disorder several country , effect study U.S. population . The investigator give ALE placebo overweight men woman low `` good '' cholesterol see ALE increase good cholesterol . The investigator also make sure ALE safe .
DOC.brief_title: The Impact Artichoke Leaf Extract Blood Cholesterol : Primary Study
DOC.detailed_description: Subjects divide one two group : ( 1 ) Pycrinil®/flaxseed oil ( 2 ) Placebo/flaxseed oil twice daily food . The two formulation identical appearance standardize Indena , S.p.A . Patients enrol total 3 month ( ± 1 week allow schedule flexibility ) 1 month ( ± 1 week allow schedule flexibility ) first follow-up visit enrollment final visit . At visit , patient ask monitor symptomatic ADE . The first follow-up visit focus medication compliance ( via pill count ) safety assessment ( include laboratory ) . The final study visit consist brief clinical assessment ( include anthropometrics ) , complete lifestyle physical activity assessment , subjective ADE reporting , donate blood urine clinical laboratory test . Medication change prohibit study period , must record . Medication bottle collect first follow-up final visit ; pill count perform assess compliance .
DOC.criteria: ≥18 year age HDL cholesterol < 40 mg/dL men < 50 mg/dL woman BMI ≥25 kg/m2 . Patient statins Triglycerides > 400 mg/dL Low density lipoprotein ( LDL ) > 190 mg/dL Significant hepatic disease ( i.e. , document diagnosis hepatic cancer , hepatitis , cirrhosis ) Significant renal disease ( i.e. , recent glomerular filtration rate < 30 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) Significant gastrointestinal tract disease ( documented diagnosis malabsorption disorder , GI cancer , uncontrolled inflammatory bowel disease ) History transplant Women reproductive potential receive birth control Pregnant/nursing woman
